data.name: OtherSoul
data.detailed_description:
We want to keep the game under continuous development, which of course includes bug fixes, changes to the map and the integration of new game elements. As our free time allows, we will work to make our game as good as possible! <3

In this horror game, you must do everything you can to escape the demon’s clutches alive. You have to be quiet and careful! The beast hears everything and chases you everywhere. If you manage to hide from it, it will still be looking for you, so be on your guard!
In the game, you can use the flashlight and the map for better orientation. You can distract the demon with different sounds. Also pay attention to your mental state, otherwise you will go crazy in the other world.
But more importantly. Remember, you are not alone. You are always being watched!

To escape from this world, you must complete a number of different tasks. For this reason, there are several endings to the gameplay, but there is only one good choice. If you haven't managed to escape the otherworldly beings... well, you can probably guess what happens to your soul and body then.

It won’t be easy! Good luck!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: In this horror game, you must do everything you can to escape the demon’s clutches alive. Your soul is at stake. You will be saved or you will be damned forever. Remember, in the game, your choices can affect the people most important to you. Protect them and your mental state! Fight to the end!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these system requirements, it is recommended to play the game on low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
